website_summaries.verdict: A little pricier than other stretch wraps when priced per square foot, but it's tough film.
pros: Gives you 18 inches of width, so it's a little wider than some other options
Uses an 80-gauge film for a good level of strength
Doesn't leave any residue behind after use, which is important when wrapping furniture
cons: Only has 1,000 feet of length in a roll, so it's not quite as long as some others

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shrink wrap
customer_reviews.text: This is good shrink wrap, the right thickness to work with. Doesn't tear until you make it tear. Get some plastic holders for it though, to cumbersome to work with otherwise. Amazon should include that as an add-on or bundled item,
customer_reviews.author: R. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good Thickness
customer_reviews.text: I used this to wrap leftover brick on pallets and when I moved them the brick shifted but the wrap held them on the pallet. I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Ison DDS

customer_reviews.title: SUPER THIN
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a shorter roll of what should have been the same product from the same company and it was awesome. This arrived yesterday and it's paper thin. We had to use it because we're in a time crunch, but we're having to use at least 4 layers to feel like there is any sort of protection.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Convertino

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to use. Served its purpose well. Could have been a bit sturdier, but a couple of extra turns around the item and it’s all good. Goes a long way too.
customer_reviews.author: CHENGLISH

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time of using Industrial Shrink Wrap so I don't have anything to go on. It seems okay and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: This stretched, but did not actually stay wrapped on ...
customer_reviews.text: This stretched, but did not actually stay wrapped on anything! it just sort of hung on whatever I wrapped it around
customer_reviews.author: floridienne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, competitive price, product as described. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Gary J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: well priced and works as good as the expensive wrap
customer_reviews.author: Brent Boostrom

customer_reviews.title: Worked as described
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Moved my daughters college furniture 900 miles and held up the entire way.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Baird

customer_reviews.title: Good Wrap
customer_reviews.text: We recently moved and used this in the past for mirrors, dressers, etc. and it worked well. Thought we needed more but it goes so far that we didn't even have to break into this new roll... my husband can use it for Ebay selling as well as other things around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: O this is very good. I wrapped my old carpet in it and sat it in a corner till it gets clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jerusha

customer_reviews.title: Moving must have!
customer_reviews.text: Great for moving and preparing our furniture for storage. Would reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: amy bolton

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to help with our move. The the strength of the wrap to hold our heavy furniture was really strong. I would highly recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Musa Mugrabi

product_meta.title: Stretch Shrink Film Wrap Industrial Strength 18" x 1100 Sq Feet, 80 Gauge Thick (20 Microns) Durable Self-Adhering Pallet Supplies - Perfect for Moving, Packing, Clear Cling Plastic Wrap Rolls
feature_bullets: HEAVY-DUTY STRETCH WRAP: Premium 80 Gauge (20 Micron) Shrink Film - Industrial strength and durable. Every single roll has a superior load retaining force.80 gauge is the most common stretch film thickness for heavy-duty stretch film machine. Banding film with its thickness firmly secures products even under rugged transit conditions. Our stretch wrap is in clear color. RANB Brand Stretch Wrap is perfect for storage or shipping.

SAVING YOU UP TO 30% IN QUANTITY WHILE PROVIDING MAXIMUM QUALITY: The RANB shrink wrap film has been specially designed to stretch up to up to 300%. 300% Stretch Ability -- Superior stretch, easy to unwrap, sticks to itself for a perfect seal. In this way, it saves you up to 30% of the quantity you would normally use while providing excellent quality.

PERFECT FOR SAFELY COLLATING, BUNDLING AND SECURING: Whether you like to wrap furniture, boxes, objects featuring odd shapes or loads that are uneven and difficult to handle, It is suitable for all stretch film machines with wide applications such as wrapping firewood, pallet, boxes, furniture, tools, and many more, this clear shrink film stretch packing wrap is a must-have for you!

100% CLEAN REMOVAL: Forget about shrink packaging pallet wraps that stick on your furniture causing damage or leave a residue on your items. Our wrap protects your possessions from dust or stains, shields surfaces of furniture from scratches, scuffs and damage without leaving behind a residue. This top-notch stretch film pallet wrap clings to itself without leaving adhesives, assuring a 100% clean removal.

HIGH QUALITY & SATISFACTION: Directly from the importer, we deliver to most of the cruise lines and large warehouses. Our stretch film has 80 gauge thicknesses, ideal for loads up to approx. The stretch film is easy to unwrap. Our Products are specially produced in TURKEY for RANB known for their superior quality. Buy with confidence .Please give us a try and then evaluate our product.
